RelatedSentence: In 2014 Lok Sabha polls , the SAD won four seats out of the total 13 seats in Punjab .
Moreover , it supported the BJP to win two seats from Gurdaspur and Hoshiarpur .

RelatedSentence: Moreover , it supported the BJP to win two seats from Gurdaspur and Hoshiarpur .
The Punjab Chief Minister Parkash Singh Badal 's daughter-in-law Harsimrat Kaur Badal won the Bhatinda seat for consecutive second time .
The party had sought votes on the pretext that if Harsimrat won , she might be a part of Narendra Modi Cabinet .

The BJP 's prime minister - elect Narendra Modi yesterday met senior party leader LK Advani as well as other leaders including from alliance partners as part of consultations aimed at formation of the new NDA government .

However , as the fierce speculation on who will get the top posts in his government are doing the rounds , it would be a matter of concern that who among Shiv Sena , Telugu Desam Party , Shiromani Akali Dal and Lok Janshakti Party , will be selected for Modi 's Cabinet .
